game.name: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
game.desc: Join Elvira in a horror adventure to save a castle from dark forces. Solve puzzles, fight monsters, and uncover the castle’s secrets.

game.name: Fatty Bear's Birthday Surprise
game.desc: Help Fatty Bear prepare for a birthday party in this interactive children’s game. Solve puzzles and explore the house to make the perfect celebration!

game.path: ./Freddi Fish 2 - The Case of the Haunted Schoolhouse/freddi2.scummvm
game.name: Freddi Fish 2 - The Case of the Haunted Schoolhouse
game.desc: Freddi Fish and Luther are back to solve the mystery of the haunting in the schoolhouse!

game.path: ./Freddi Fish 3 - The Case of the Stolen Conch Shell/freddi3.scummvm
game.name: Freddi Fish 3 - The Case of the Stolen Conch Shell
game.desc: Help Freddi Fish recover the stolen conch shell and solve another underwater mystery with her friend Luther.

game.path: ./Freddi Fish 4 - The Case of the Hogfish Rustlers of Briny Gulch/freddi4.scummvm
game.name: Freddi Fish 4 - The Case of the Hogfish Rustlers of Briny Gulch
game.desc: Freddi Fish and Luther dive into a Western-themed adventure to recover the hogfish rustled from Briny Gulch.

game.path: ./Freddi Fish 5 - The Case of the Creature of Coral Cove/freddicove.scummvm
game.name: Freddi Fish 5 - The Case of the Creature of Coral Cove
game.desc: Freddi Fish investigates a mysterious sea creature terrorizing Coral Cove.

game.path: ./Freddi Fish - The Case of the Missing Kelp Seeds/freddi.scummvm
game.name: Freddi Fish - The Case of the Missing Kelp Seeds
game.desc: Join Freddi Fish and her friend Luther as they solve the mystery of the missing kelp seeds in an underwater adventure.

game.name: Let's Explore the Jungle with Buzzy
game.desc: An educational adventure that allows children to explore the jungle with Buzzy the Knowledge Bug, learning about plants, animals, and ecosystems.

game.name: Living Books- Arthur's Teacher Trouble
game.desc: Join Arthur in his interactive school adventure, as he faces off with Mr. Ratburn’s spelling test challenge!

game.path: ./Living Books - The Berenstain Bears in the Dark/beardark.scummvm
game.name: Living Books - The Berenstain Bears in the Dark
game.desc: The Berenstain Bears face their fears in the dark in this interactive storybook adventure.

game.path: ./Living Books - The Tortoise and the Hare/tortoise.scummvm
game.name: Living Books - The Tortoise and the Hare
game.desc: Experience the classic story of The Tortoise and the Hare in an interactive adventure, where players explore, listen, and learn along with the story.

game.name: Magic Tales - Liam Finds a Story
game.desc: Help Liam discover the magic of storytelling in this interactive children’s adventure.

game.name: Monkey Island
game.desc: Set sail as Guybrush Threepwood, a wannabe pirate, in this classic adventure filled with humor, puzzles, and legendary pirate duels.

game.name: Neverhood
game.desc: Step into a world of claymation and puzzles as you explore The Neverhood, uncover its secrets, and solve mysteries.

game.name: Pajama Sam 2
game.desc: Join Pajama Sam on an adventure to conquer his fear of thunderstorms in Thunder and Lightning Aren’t So Frightening.

game.name: Pajama Sam 3
game.desc: Help Pajama Sam clean up the world of junk food in You Are What You Eat from Your Head to Your Feet.

game.name: Pajama Sam
game.desc: Pajama Sam faces his fears and embarks on an adventure to capture the villain Darkness.

game.name: Putt-Putt Enters the Race
game.desc: Join Putt-Putt as he gears up to participate in the Cartown 500 race!

game.name: Putt-Putt Goes to the Moon
game.desc: Putt-Putt gets launched to the moon and needs help to find his way back to Earth!

game.name: Putt-Putt Joins the Circus
game.desc: Help Putt-Putt and Pep with circus-related challenges in this colorful adventure.

game.name: Putt-Putt Joins the Parade
game.desc: Putt-Putt embarks on his first adventure in Cartown, helping the town prepare for the parade.

game.name: Putt-Putt Saves the Zoo
game.desc: Putt-Putt needs your help to rescue missing baby animals and ensure the grand opening of the Cartown Zoo!

game.name: Putt-Putt Travels Through Time
game.desc: Putt-Putt and Pep must retrieve their belongings after accidentally traveling back in time!

game.path: ./Quest for Glory I: So You Want to be a Hero/qfg1.scummvm
game.name: Quest for Glory I: So You Want to be a Hero
game.desc: An adventure-RPG where you shape your hero’s skills and journey through dangerous lands in the kingdom of Spielburg.

game.name: Spy Fox - Dry Cereal
game.desc: Join Spy Fox in his mission to save the world's dairy supply in this spy-themed adventure for kids.

game.name: Spy Fox - Operation Ozone
game.desc: Spy Fox is back to stop a scheme that threatens Earth’s ozone layer in this kid-friendly spy adventure.

game.name: Spy Fox - Some Assembly Required
game.desc: Spy Fox must stop a scheme involving assembly-required toys in this spy adventure.

game.name: The Dig
game.desc: A group of astronauts uncovers an alien world while investigating an asteroid, revealing mysteries beyond their imagination.
